body: This short and broad club is made of hardened wood or bone. It has a notch on one side that is used for catching weapons. If you are proficient, you use the notch in the wahaika to disarm your foes. Otherwise, treat this weapon as a club. Feats and abilities that affect clubs apply to the wahaika.
name: Wahaika
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Primitive Armor and Weapons/The Stone Age/Wahaika
